description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Tired of RPG's with convoluted plot lines and hour long cutscenes? Sick of cutting-edge graphics that just make your eyes bleed? With the Optimal Character Development system, you can focus on what's important: grinding your characters.
description.short: Tired of RPG's with convoluted plot lines and hour long cutscenes? Sick of cutting-edge graphics that just make your eyes bleed? With the Optimal Character Development system, you can focus on what's important: grinding your characters.
